Reference

Package

osprey

osprey: Additional general TLGs to tern

Graphs

Graphs

g_ae_sub()

Adverse Event Category Plot

g_butterfly()

Butterfly Plot

g_events_term_id()

Events by Term Plot

g_heat_bygrade()

Heatmap by Grade

g_hy_law()

Hy's Law Plot

g_patient_profile()

Patient Profile Plot

g_spiderplot()

Spider Plot

g_swimlane()

Swimlane Plot

g_waterfall()

Waterfall Plot

spiderplot_simple()

Simple spider plot

Tables

some useful tables

Utility

as_pdf()

Output decorated grob (gTree) objects as PDF

create_flag_vars()

create AE overview flags

grobs2pdf()

Decorate grob (gTree) objects then outputs as IDM compatible PDF

grob_parts()

Extract specific parts of a ggplot or grob

stream_filter()

Applies STREAM style filtering to datasets

stream_filter_convwhere()

Convert SAS code to R code

stream_filter_index()

Replicates the use of index function in sas for logic options

Elementary Functions

patient_domain_profile()

Patient Domain Profile

Data

rADAE

Random adverse events

rADRS

Random response

rADSL

Random patient listing

rADTR

Random data rADTR

rADTTE

Random Time to Event Analysis Dataset

Unexported functions

argument_convention

Standard Arguments

domain_check()

a helper function for g_patient_profile to check whether the domain has data available

grob_add_padding()

Add padding to grob

grob_part() grob_part()

Extract specific part of a ggplot or grob

meddra

Meddra data

theme_osprey() theme_osprey()

this theme is used across many figures. can be safely removed if update the theme in each function
